ja.site_subtitle: 統合ゲーミング環境自動化ツール
ja.description_1: は無料のオープンソース統合ゲーミング環境自動化ツールです。単一の実行ファイルで、直感的なGUIから設定することも、コマンドラインから直接ゲームを起動することも可能です。アンチチート競合を防止し、ゲーミング最適化設定（Windowsキー無効化など）を構成し、OBS、Discord（近日公開）、VTube Studioと連携して完璧なゲーミング環境を自動的に作成します。PowerShellとWPFで構築され、設定にはJSON設定ファイルを使用し、シームレスなユーザー体験を提供します。
ja.description_2: Focus Game Deckは、競技ゲーミング、ゲーム配信のため制作されました。個人利用・教育用途だけでなく、MITライセンスの下で商用としても無料で利用できます。
ja.download_description: Focus Game DeckはWindows 10/11対応のシンプルで軽量な実行ファイル（わずか数MB）として利用可能です。ダブルクリックするだけで直感的な設定インターフェースが開きます。もちろんコマンドラインからゲームを直接起動することも可能です。最新リリースとソースコードはGitHubから入手できます。
ja.download_latest: 最新リリースをダウンロード
ja.features_description: Focus Game Deckの主要な機能の一つは、広範囲なゲーミングプラットフォーム統合のサポートです。複数のゲームランチャーと自動最適化プロセスを同時に実行し、包括的なゲーミング環境管理ソリューションを提供します。さらに、様々なゲーミングシナリオと定期的に実行する必要があるタスクに対応する幅広い最適化機能を提供します。
ja.feature_unified: 統合インターフェース - GUI設定と直接ゲーム起動を統合した単一実行ファイル
ja.feature_process: プロセス管理 - ゲームセッション中に競合するプロセスを一時的に無効化
ja.feature_anticheat: アンチチート互換性 - BattlEyeやEasyAntiCheatなどのアンチチートシステムとの一般的な競合を防止
ja.feature_platform: プラットフォーム統合 - Steam、Epic Games Store、Riot Clientをサポート
ja.feature_obs: OBS統合 - 自動起動、リプレイバッファの開始
ja.feature_discord: Discord統合 - ステータス更新とRich Presence統合（近日公開）
ja.feature_vtube: VTube Studioサポート - 自動起動
ja.feature_system: システム最適化 - Windowsキー無効化、電源プラン切り替え、リソース最適化
ja.feature_config: 設定管理 - 検証とバックアップ機能付きJSON ベース設定
ja.feature_logging: ログ記録 - トラブルシューティング用の包括的なログ記録とエラー報告
ja.feature_restore: 自動復元 - ゲームセッション終了後に元の環境への復元を実現できます。
ja.footer_copyright: Copyright (c) 2025 Focus Game Deck. MITライセンスの下でリリースされています。
ja.hero_image_alt: Focus Game Deck アプリケーションのスクリーンショット
ja.feedback_title: フィードバックをお待ちしています
ja.feedback_description: バグ報告や機能要望は大歓迎です！あなたの意見や体験を共有して、Focus Game Deckの改善にご協力ください。
ja.feedback_button: フィードバックを送る (GitHub Issues)
ja.manual_title: Focus Game Deck - GUIマニュアル
ja.manual_subtitle: 統合ゲーミング環境インターフェースの完全ガイド
ja.nav_troubleshooting: トラブルシューティング
ja.quick_start_title: クイックスタートガイド
ja.quick_start_intro: Focus Game Deck v2.0.0は、設定管理とゲーム起動を1つの使いやすいアプリケーションに統合した統合インターフェースを導入しています。
ja.launching_app_title: アプリケーションの起動
ja.gui_mode_desc: Focus-Game-Deck.exeをダブルクリックするだけで設定インターフェースが開きます。
ja.cli_mode_title: コマンドラインモード
ja.cli_mode_desc: Focus-Game-Deck.exe <game-id>を実行して、コマンドラインから直接ゲームを起動します。
ja.screenshot_placeholder: スクリーンショット：近日公開
ja.game_launcher_title: ゲームランチャータブ
ja.game_launcher_intro: ゲームランチャータブは、最適化された設定で設定済みのゲームを起動するための主要なインターフェースです。
ja.using_launcher_title: ゲームランチャーの使用
ja.launcher_step_1: 利用可能なゲームカードからゲームを選択
ja.launcher_step_2: ゲームのステータスと起動ボタンを確認
ja.launcher_step_3: 「ゲームを起動」をクリックして最適化された環境で起動
ja.launcher_step_4: アプリケーションが自動的にゲーム設定を構成
ja.launcher_step_5: アンチチート保護と最適化を備えてゲームが起動
ja.launcher_features_title: ゲームランチャーの機能
ja.launcher_feature_1: 環境最適化を備えたワンクリックゲーム起動
ja.launcher_feature_2: 各ゲームのリアルタイムステータスインジケーター
ja.launcher_feature_3: Steam、Epic Games Store、Riot Clientとの統合
ja.launcher_feature_4: ゲームセッション後の自動設定復元
ja.game_settings_intro: 特定の起動パラメータ、プロセス管理、プラットフォーム統合を使用して個々のゲームを構成します。
ja.add_game_step_2: 「新しいゲームを追加」ボタンをクリック
ja.add_game_step_3: ゲームの詳細を入力（名前、Steam App ID、プロセス名）
ja.add_game_step_4: 必要に応じてプラットフォーム固有の設定を構成
ja.add_game_step_5: 設定を保存してランチャーでゲームを利用可能にする
ja.setting_game_name: ゲーム名：ランチャーに表示される名前
ja.setting_process_name: プロセス名：実行ファイル名
ja.setting_launch_args: 起動引数：カスタム起動パラメータ
ja.setting_platform: プラットフォーム：Steam、Epic、Riot、またはスタンドアロン
ja.setting_pre_actions: 起動前アクション：環境準備
ja.app_management_title: アプリケーション管理
ja.app_management_intro: 最適なパフォーマンスとアンチチート互換性のために、ゲームセッション中に管理するアプリケーションを構成します。
ja.managed_apps_title: 管理対象アプリケーション
ja.system_apps_title: システムアプリケーション
ja.app_nowinkey: NoWinKey - ゲーム中にWindowsキーを無効化
ja.app_autohotkey: AutoHotkey - カスタムキーボードショートカット

ja.app_discord: Discord - コミュニケーション＆Rich Presence（近日公開）
ja.global_settings_intro: 言語、統合、システム動作を含むアプリケーション全体の設定を構成します。

ja.setting_theme: テーマ：ライト/ダークモードサポート
ja.troubleshooting_title: トラブルシューティング
ja.common_issues_title: 一般的な問題と解決策
ja.troubleshoot_step_1: ゲーム設定タブでゲーム設定を確認
ja.troubleshoot_step_2: Steam App IDまたは実行ファイルパスを確認
ja.troubleshoot_step_3: プラットフォーム（Steam/Epic/Riot）が実行中であることを確認
ja.troubleshoot_step_4: アプリケーションログでエラーメッセージを確認
ja.obs_troubleshoot_1: OBS StudioがWebSocketプラグインで実行されていることを確認
ja.obs_troubleshoot_2: グローバル設定でホストとポートの設定を確認
ja.obs_troubleshoot_3: WebSocketパスワードが設定と一致していることを確認
ja.obs_troubleshoot_4: OBS WebSocket設定から接続をテスト
ja.anticheat_info: Focus Game Deckはアンチチートフレンドリーに設計されています。問題が発生した場合：
ja.anticheat_tip_1: デジタル署名されたリリースバージョンを使用していることを確認
ja.anticheat_tip_2: Focus Game Deckをウイルス対策ソフトのホワイトリストに追加
ja.anticheat_tip_3: 誤検知を開発チームに報告

zh-CN.site_subtitle: 统一游戏环境自动化工具
zh-CN.description_1: 是一个免费的开源统一游戏环境自动化工具。通过单一可执行文件，您可以通过直观的GUI配置游戏，也可以从命令行直接启动游戏。它可以防止反作弊冲突，配置游戏优化设置（如禁用Windows键），并与OBS、Discord（即将推出）和VTube Studio集成，自动创建完美的游戏环境。使用PowerShell和WPF构建，使用JSON配置文件进行设置，提供无缝的用户体验。
zh-CN.description_2: Focus Game Deck 专为竞技游戏和游戏直播而设计。除了个人和教育用途外，在MIT许可证下商业用途也可免费使用。
zh-CN.download_description: Focus Game Deck适用于Windows 10/11，提供简单轻量的可执行文件（仅几MB）。只需双击即可打开直观的配置界面。当然您也可以选择从命令行直接启动游戏。最新版本和源代码可通过GitHub获取。
zh-CN.features_description: Focus Game Deck的主要功能之一是支持广泛的游戏平台集成。该软件支持多个游戏启动器和自动优化进程，可同时运行以提供全面的游戏环境管理解决方案。此外，它还为各种游戏场景和需要定期执行的任务提供了广泛的优化功能。
zh-CN.feature_unified: 统一界面 - 集成GUI配置和直接游戏启动的单一可执行文件
zh-CN.feature_process: 进程管理 - 在游戏会话期间临时禁用冲突进程
zh-CN.feature_anticheat: 反作弊兼容性 - 防止与BattlEye和EasyAntiCheat等反作弊系统的常见冲突
zh-CN.feature_platform: 平台集成 - 支持Steam、Epic Games商店和Riot客户端
zh-CN.feature_obs: OBS集成 - 自动启动，启动回放缓冲区
zh-CN.feature_discord: Discord集成 - 状态更新和Rich Presence集成（即将推出）
zh-CN.feature_vtube: VTube Studio支持 - 自动启动
zh-CN.feature_system: 系统优化 - Windows键禁用、电源计划切换和资源优化
zh-CN.feature_config: 配置管理 - 基于JSON的配置，具有验证和备份功能
zh-CN.feature_logging: 日志记录 - 用于故障排除的全面日志记录和错误报告
zh-CN.feature_restore: 自动还原 - 游戏会话结束后可实现对原始环境的还原。
zh-CN.footer_copyright: 版权所有 (c) 2025 Focus Game Deck. 在MIT许可证下发布。
zh-CN.hero_image_alt: Focus Game Deck 应用程序截图
zh-CN.feedback_description: 我们欢迎错误报告和功能请求！通过分享您的想法和体验来帮助我们改进 Focus Game Deck。
zh-CN.manual_subtitle: 统一游戏环境界面完整指南
zh-CN.quick_start_intro: Focus Game Deck v2.0.0引入了统一界面，将配置管理和游戏启动集成在一个用户友好的应用程序中。
zh-CN.gui_mode_desc: 只需双击Focus-Game-Deck.exe即可打开配置界面。
zh-CN.cli_mode_desc: 运行Focus-Game-Deck.exe <game-id>从命令行直接启动游戏。
zh-CN.game_launcher_intro: 游戏启动器标签页是您使用优化设置启动配置游戏的主要界面。
zh-CN.launcher_step_1: 从可用的游戏卡片中选择您的游戏
zh-CN.launcher_step_2: 查看游戏状态和启动按钮
zh-CN.launcher_step_3: 点击「启动游戏」以使用优化环境启动
zh-CN.launcher_step_4: 应用程序将自动配置游戏设置
zh-CN.launcher_step_5: 游戏将以反作弊保护和优化启动
zh-CN.launcher_feature_1: 一键游戏启动与环境优化
zh-CN.launcher_feature_2: 每个游戏的实时状态指示器
zh-CN.launcher_feature_3: 与Steam、Epic Games商店和Riot客户端集成
zh-CN.launcher_feature_4: 游戏会话后自动恢复设置
zh-CN.game_settings_intro: 使用特定启动参数、进程管理和平台集成配置单个游戏。
zh-CN.add_game_step_1: 导航到「游戏设置」标签页
zh-CN.add_game_step_3: 输入游戏详细信息（名称、Steam App ID、进程名称）
zh-CN.add_game_step_4: 如需要，配置平台特定设置
zh-CN.add_game_step_5: 保存配置以使游戏在启动器中可用
zh-CN.setting_game_name: 游戏名称：启动器中显示的名称
zh-CN.setting_process_name: 进程名称：可执行文件名
zh-CN.setting_launch_args: 启动参数：自定义启动参数
zh-CN.app_management_intro: 配置在游戏会话期间管理哪些应用程序，以获得最佳性能和反作弊兼容性。
zh-CN.app_autohotkey: AutoHotkey - 自定义键盘快捷键
zh-CN.app_obs: OBS Studio - 流媒体和录制管理
zh-CN.app_vtube: VTube Studio - 虚拟形象管理
zh-CN.app_discord: Discord - 通信和Rich Presence（即将推出）
zh-CN.global_settings_intro: 配置应用程序范围的设置，包括语言、集成和系统行为。
zh-CN.setting_language: 语言：自动检测或手动选择
zh-CN.setting_theme: 主题：浅色/深色模式支持
zh-CN.troubleshoot_step_1: 在游戏设置标签页中验证游戏配置
zh-CN.troubleshoot_step_2: 检查Steam App ID或可执行文件路径
zh-CN.troubleshoot_step_4: 检查应用程序日志中的错误消息
zh-CN.obs_troubleshoot_1: 验证OBS Studio是否正在运行WebSocket插件
zh-CN.obs_troubleshoot_2: 在全局设置中检查主机和端口设置
zh-CN.anticheat_info: Focus Game Deck设计为反作弊友好。如果遇到问题：
zh-CN.anticheat_tip_1: 确保您使用的是数字签名的发行版本
zh-CN.anticheat_tip_2: 将Focus Game Deck添加到防病毒软件白名单
zh-CN.anticheat_tip_3: 向开发团队报告任何误报

en.description_1: is a free, open-source unified gaming environment automation tool. With a single executable, you can configure games through an intuitive GUI or launch them directly from the command line. It prevents anti-cheat conflicts, configures gaming-optimized settings (like disabling Windows key), and integrates with OBS, Discord (Coming Soon), and VTube Studio to create the perfect gaming environment automatically. Built with PowerShell and WPF, it uses JSON configuration files for settings and provides a seamless user experience.
en.description_2: Focus Game Deck was created for competitive gaming and game streaming. In addition to personal and educational use, it is also available free of charge for commercial use under the MIT license.
en.download_description: Focus Game Deck is available for Windows 10/11 as a simple, lightweight executable file (just a few MB). Simply double-click to open the intuitive configuration interface. Of course, you can also launch games directly from the command line if preferred. The latest release and source code are available through GitHub.
en.features_description: One of the key features of Focus Game Deck is its support for extensive gaming platform integration. The software supports multiple game launchers and automated optimization processes that can be run simultaneously to provide a comprehensive gaming environment management solution. In addition, it offers a wide range of optimization features for various gaming scenarios and tasks that need to be performed on a regular basis.
en.feature_unified: Unified Interface - single executable with integrated GUI configuration and direct game launching
en.feature_process: Process Management - temporarily disable conflicting processes during gaming sessions
en.feature_anticheat: Anti-cheat Compatibility - prevent common conflicts with anti-cheat systems like BattlEye and EasyAntiCheat
en.feature_platform: Platform Integration - support for Steam, Epic Games Store, and Riot Client
en.feature_obs: OBS Integration - automatic launch, replay buffer activation
en.feature_discord: Discord Integration - status updates and Rich Presence integration (Coming Soon)
en.feature_system: System Optimization - Windows key disabling, power plan switching, and resource optimization
en.feature_config: Configuration Management - JSON-based configuration with validation and backup
en.feature_logging: Logging - comprehensive logging and error reporting for troubleshooting
en.feature_restore: Automatic Restoration - restores the original environment after game sessions end.
en.footer_copyright: Copyright (c) 2025 Focus Game Deck. Released under the MIT License.
en.feedback_description: Bug reports and feature requests are always welcome! Help us improve Focus Game Deck by sharing your thoughts and experiences.
en.manual_subtitle: Complete guide to the unified gaming environment interface
en.quick_start_intro: Focus Game Deck v2.0.0 introduces a unified interface that combines configuration management and game launching in a single, user-friendly application.
en.gui_mode_desc: Simply double-click Focus-Game-Deck.exe to open the configuration interface.
en.cli_mode_desc: Run Focus-Game-Deck.exe <game-id> to launch games directly from command line.
en.game_launcher_intro: The Game Launcher tab is your primary interface for launching configured games with optimized settings.
en.launcher_step_1: Select your game from the available game cards
en.launcher_step_2: Review the game status and launch button
en.launcher_step_3: Click 'Launch Game' to start with optimized environment
en.launcher_step_4: The application will automatically configure gaming settings
en.launcher_step_5: Game will launch with anti-cheat protection and optimizations
en.launcher_feature_1: One-click game launching with environment optimization
en.launcher_feature_2: Real-time status indicators for each game
en.launcher_feature_3: Integration with Steam, Epic Games Store, and Riot Client
en.launcher_feature_4: Automatic settings restoration after gaming sessions
en.game_settings_intro: Configure individual games with specific launch parameters, process management, and platform integration.
en.add_game_step_3: Enter game details (Name, Steam App ID, Process Name)
en.add_game_step_5: Save configuration to make the game available in launcher
en.setting_game_name: Game Name: Display name in launcher
en.setting_steam_id: Steam App ID: For Steam integration
en.setting_platform: Platform: Steam, Epic, Riot, or Standalone
en.app_management_intro: Configure which applications to manage during gaming sessions for optimal performance and anti-cheat compatibility.
en.app_nowinkey: NoWinKey - Disable Windows key during gaming
en.app_obs: OBS Studio - Stream and recording management
en.app_discord: Discord - Communication and Rich Presence (Coming Soon)
en.global_settings_intro: Configure application-wide settings including language, integrations, and system behavior.
en.troubleshoot_step_1: Verify game configuration in Game Settings tab
en.troubleshoot_step_2: Check Steam App ID or executable path
en.troubleshoot_step_4: Check application logs for error messages
en.obs_troubleshoot_1: Verify OBS Studio is running with WebSocket plugin
en.obs_troubleshoot_2: Check Host and Port settings in Global Settings
en.obs_troubleshoot_4: Test connection from OBS WebSocket settings
en.anticheat_info: Focus Game Deck is designed to be anti-cheat friendly. If you encounter issues:
en.anticheat_tip_1: Ensure you're using the digitally signed release version
en.anticheat_tip_2: Add Focus Game Deck to your antivirus whitelist
en.anticheat_tip_3: Report any false positives to the development team

ru.description_1: is a free, open-source unified gaming environment automation tool. With a single executable, you can configure games through an intuitive GUI or launch them directly from the command line. It prevents anti-cheat conflicts, configures gaming-optimized settings (like disabling Windows key), and integrates with OBS, Discord, and VTube Studio to create the perfect gaming environment automatically. Built with PowerShell and WPF, it uses JSON configuration files for settings and provides a seamless user experience.
ru.description_2: Focus Game Deck был создан для киберспортивных игр и стриминга. Помимо личного и образовательного использования, он также доступен бесплатно для коммерческого использования по лицензии MIT.
ru.download_description: Focus Game Deck доступен для Windows 10/11 в виде простого, легкого исполняемого файла (всего несколько МБ). Просто дважды щелкните, чтобы открыть интуитивно понятный интерфейс конфигурации. Конечно, вы также можете запускать игры непосредственно из командной строки, если хотите. Последний выпуск и исходный код доступны через GitHub.
ru.features_description: One of the key features of Focus Game Deck is its support for extensive gaming platform integration. The software supports multiple game launchers and automated optimization processes that can be run simultaneously to provide a comprehensive gaming environment management solution. In addition, it offers a wide range of optimization features for various gaming scenarios and tasks that need to be performed on a regular basis.
ru.feature_unified: Unified Interface - single executable with integrated GUI configuration and direct game launching
ru.feature_process: Process Management - temporarily disable conflicting processes during gaming sessions
ru.feature_anticheat: Anti-cheat Compatibility - prevent common conflicts with anti-cheat systems like BattlEye and EasyAntiCheat
ru.feature_platform: Platform Integration - support for Steam, Epic Games Store, and Riot Client
ru.feature_obs: OBS Integration - автоматический запуск, активация буфера повтора
ru.feature_discord: Discord Integration - status updates and Rich Presence integration
ru.feature_system: System Optimization - Windows key disabling, power plan switching, and resource optimization
ru.feature_config: Configuration Management - JSON-based configuration with validation and backup
ru.feature_logging: Logging - comprehensive logging and error reporting for troubleshooting
ru.feature_restore: Automatic Restoration - восстанавливает исходную среду после завершения игровых сессий.
ru.footer_copyright: Copyright (c) 2025 Focus Game Deck. Released under the MIT License.
ru.feedback_description: Bug reports and feature requests are always welcome! Help us improve Focus Game Deck by sharing your thoughts and experiences.
ru.manual_subtitle: Complete guide to the unified gaming environment interface
ru.quick_start_intro: Focus Game Deck v2.0.0 introduces a unified interface that combines configuration management and game launching in a single, user-friendly application.
ru.gui_mode_desc: Simply double-click Focus-Game-Deck.exe to open the configuration interface.
ru.cli_mode_desc: Run Focus-Game-Deck.exe <game-id> to launch games directly from command line.
ru.game_launcher_intro: The Game Launcher tab is your primary interface for launching configured games with optimized settings.
ru.launcher_step_1: Select your game from the available game cards
ru.launcher_step_2: Review the game status and launch button

ru.launcher_feature_3: Integration with Steam, Epic Games Store, and Riot Client

ru.anticheat_info: Focus Game Deck is designed to be anti-cheat friendly. If you encounter issues:
ru.anticheat_tip_1: Ensure you're using the digitally signed release version
ru.anticheat_tip_2: Add Focus Game Deck to your antivirus whitelist
ru.anticheat_tip_3: Report any false positives to the development team

fr.description_1: is a free, open-source unified gaming environment automation tool. With a single executable, you can configure games through an intuitive GUI or launch them directly from the command line. It prevents anti-cheat conflicts, configures gaming-optimized settings (like disabling Windows key), and integrates with OBS, Discord, and VTube Studio to create the perfect gaming environment automatically. Built with PowerShell and WPF, it uses JSON configuration files for settings and provides a seamless user experience.
fr.description_2: Focus Game Deck is widely used in industries such as competitive gaming, game streaming, and software development for gamers who require optimization tools. As well as being employed commercially, it is also available as a free-to-use tool under the MIT license for personal and educational use.
fr.download_description: Focus Game Deck est disponible pour Windows 10/11 sous forme de fichier exécutable simple et léger (quelques Mo seulement). Double-cliquez simplement pour ouvrir l'interface de configuration intuitive. Bien sûr, vous pouvez également lancer des jeux directement depuis la ligne de commande si vous préférez. La dernière version et le code source sont disponibles via GitHub.
fr.features_description: One of the key features of Focus Game Deck is its support for extensive gaming platform integration. The software supports multiple game launchers and automated optimization processes that can be run simultaneously to provide a comprehensive gaming environment management solution. In addition, it offers a wide range of optimization features for various gaming scenarios and tasks that need to be performed on a regular basis.
fr.feature_unified: Unified Interface - single executable with integrated GUI configuration and direct game launching
fr.feature_process: Process Management - temporarily disable conflicting processes during gaming sessions
fr.feature_anticheat: Anti-cheat Compatibility - prevent common conflicts with anti-cheat systems like BattlEye and EasyAntiCheat
fr.feature_platform: Platform Integration - support for Steam, Epic Games Store, and Riot Client
fr.feature_obs: OBS Integration - lancement automatique, activation du tampon de relecture
fr.feature_discord: Discord Integration - status updates and Rich Presence integration
fr.feature_system: System Optimization - Windows key disabling, power plan switching, and resource optimization
fr.feature_config: Configuration Management - JSON-based configuration with validation and backup
fr.feature_logging: Logging - comprehensive logging and error reporting for troubleshooting
fr.feature_restore: Automatic Restoration - restaure l'environnement d'origine après la fin des sessions de jeu.
fr.footer_copyright: Copyright (c) 2025 Focus Game Deck. Released under the MIT License.
fr.feedback_description: Bug reports and feature requests are always welcome! Help us improve Focus Game Deck by sharing your thoughts and experiences.

es.site_subtitle: Herramienta de automatización del entorno de juego
es.description_1: is a free, open-source unified gaming environment automation tool. With a single executable, you can configure games through an intuitive GUI or launch them directly from the command line. It prevents anti-cheat conflicts, configures gaming-optimized settings (like disabling Windows key), and integrates with OBS, Discord, and VTube Studio to create the perfect gaming environment automatically. Built with PowerShell and WPF, it uses JSON configuration files for settings and provides a seamless user experience.
es.description_2: Focus Game Deck is widely used in industries such as competitive gaming, game streaming, and software development for gamers who require optimization tools. As well as being employed commercially, it is also available as a free-to-use tool under the MIT license for personal and educational use.
es.download_description: Focus Game Deck está disponible para Windows 10/11 como un archivo ejecutable simple y liviano (solo unos pocos MB). Simplemente haga doble clic para abrir la interfaz de configuración intuitiva. Por supuesto, también puede iniciar juegos directamente desde la línea de comandos si lo prefiere. La última versión y el código fuente están disponibles a través de GitHub.
es.features_description: One of the key features of Focus Game Deck is its support for extensive gaming platform integration. The software supports multiple game launchers and automated optimization processes that can be run simultaneously to provide a comprehensive gaming environment management solution. In addition, it offers a wide range of optimization features for various gaming scenarios and tasks that need to be performed on a regular basis.
es.feature_unified: Unified Interface - single executable with integrated GUI configuration and direct game launching
es.feature_process: Process Management - temporarily disable conflicting processes during gaming sessions
es.feature_anticheat: Anti-cheat Compatibility - prevent common conflicts with anti-cheat systems like BattlEye and EasyAntiCheat

es.feature_system: System Optimization - Windows key disabling, power plan switching, and resource optimization
es.feature_config: Configuration Management - JSON-based configuration with validation and backup
es.feature_logging: Logging - comprehensive logging and error reporting for troubleshooting
es.feature_restore: Automatic Restoration - restaura el entorno original después de que terminan las sesiones de juego.

pt-BR.site_subtitle: Ferramenta Unificada de Automação de Ambiente de Jogos
pt-BR.description_1: é uma ferramenta de automação de ambiente de jogos unificada, gratuita e de código aberto. Com um único executável, você pode configurar jogos através de uma GUI intuitiva ou lançá-los diretamente da linha de comando. Ele evita conflitos de anti-cheat, define configurações otimizadas para jogos (como desativar a tecla Windows) e integra-se com OBS, Discord (Em Breve) e VTube Studio para criar o ambiente de jogo perfeito automaticamente. Construído com PowerShell e WPF, utiliza arquivos de configuração JSON e oferece uma experiência de usuário perfeita.
pt-BR.description_2: O Focus Game Deck foi criado para jogos competitivos e streaming de jogos. Além do uso pessoal e educacional, também está disponível gratuitamente para uso comercial sob a licença MIT.
pt-BR.download_description: O Focus Game Deck está disponível para Windows 10/11 como um arquivo executável simples e leve (apenas alguns MB). Basta clicar duas vezes para abrir a interface de configuração intuitiva. Claro, você também pode iniciar jogos diretamente da linha de comando, se preferir. A versão mais recente e o código-fonte estão disponíveis no GitHub.
pt-BR.features_description: Uma das principais características do Focus Game Deck é o suporte para ampla integração com plataformas de jogos. O software suporta múltiplos lançadores de jogos e processos de otimização automatizados que podem ser executados simultaneamente para fornecer uma solução abrangente de gerenciamento de ambiente de jogos. Além disso, oferece uma ampla gama de recursos de otimização para vários cenários de jogos e tarefas que precisam ser realizadas regularmente.
pt-BR.feature_unified: Interface Unificada - executável único com configuração GUI integrada e lançamento direto de jogos
pt-BR.feature_process: Gerenciamento de Processos - desative temporariamente processos conflitantes durante sessões de jogo
pt-BR.feature_anticheat: Compatibilidade Anti-cheat - previne conflitos comuns com sistemas anti-cheat como BattlEye e EasyAntiCheat
pt-BR.feature_platform: Integração de Plataforma - suporte para Steam, Epic Games Store e Riot Client
pt-BR.feature_obs: Integração OBS - lançamento automático, ativação do buffer de repetição
pt-BR.feature_discord: Integração Discord - atualizações de status e integração Rich Presence (Em Breve)
pt-BR.feature_system: Otimização do Sistema - desativação da tecla Windows, troca de plano de energia e otimização de recursos
pt-BR.feature_config: Gerenciamento de Configuração - configuração baseada em JSON com validação e backup
pt-BR.feature_logging: Registro de Log - registro abrangente e relatório de erros para solução de problemas
pt-BR.feature_restore: Restauração Automática - restaura o ambiente original após o término das sessões de jogo.
pt-BR.footer_copyright: Copyright (c) 2025 Focus Game Deck. Lançado sob a Licença MIT.
pt-BR.hero_image_alt: Captura de tela do aplicativo Focus Game Deck
pt-BR.feedback_description: Relatórios de bugs e solicitações de recursos são sempre bem-vindos! Ajude-nos a melhorar o Focus Game Deck compartilhando suas ideias e experiências.
pt-BR.manual_title: Focus Game Deck - Manual da GUI
pt-BR.manual_subtitle: Guia completo para a interface unificada de ambiente de jogos
pt-BR.quick_start_intro: O Focus Game Deck v2.0.0 introduz uma interface unificada que combina gerenciamento de configuração e lançamento de jogos em um único aplicativo amigável.
pt-BR.gui_mode_desc: Basta clicar duas vezes em Focus-Game-Deck.exe para abrir a interface de configuração.
pt-BR.cli_mode_desc: Execute Focus-Game-Deck.exe <game-id> para iniciar jogos diretamente da linha de comando.
pt-BR.game_launcher_intro: A aba Inicializador de Jogos é sua interface principal para iniciar jogos configurados com configurações otimizadas.
pt-BR.launcher_step_1: Selecione seu jogo nos cartões de jogo disponíveis
pt-BR.launcher_step_2: Revise o status do jogo e o botão de iniciar
pt-BR.launcher_step_3: Clique em 'Iniciar Jogo' para começar com o ambiente otimizado
pt-BR.launcher_step_4: O aplicativo configurará automaticamente as definições do jogo
pt-BR.launcher_step_5: O jogo será iniciado com proteção anti-cheat e otimizações
pt-BR.launcher_feature_1: Início de jogo com um clique com otimização de ambiente
pt-BR.launcher_feature_2: Indicadores de status em tempo real para cada jogo
pt-BR.launcher_feature_3: Integração com Steam, Epic Games Store e Riot Client
pt-BR.launcher_feature_4: Restauração automática de configurações após sessões de jogo
pt-BR.game_settings_intro: Configure jogos individuais com parâmetros de inicialização específicos, gerenciamento de processos e integração de plataforma.
pt-BR.add_game_step_1: Navegue até a aba 'Configurações de Jogo'
pt-BR.add_game_step_3: Insira os detalhes do jogo (Nome, Steam App ID, Nome do Processo)
pt-BR.add_game_step_4: Configure definições específicas da plataforma, se necessário
pt-BR.add_game_step_5: Salve a configuração para tornar o jogo disponível no inicializador
pt-BR.setting_game_name: Nome do Jogo: Nome de exibição no inicializador
pt-BR.setting_steam_id: Steam App ID: Para integração com Steam
pt-BR.setting_process_name: Nome do Processo: Nome do arquivo executável
pt-BR.setting_launch_args: Argumentos de Inicialização: Parâmetros de inicialização personalizados
pt-BR.setting_platform: Plataforma: Steam, Epic, Riot ou Independente
pt-BR.app_management_intro: Configure quais aplicativos gerenciar durante as sessões de jogo para desempenho ideal e compatibilidade anti-cheat.
pt-BR.app_nowinkey: NoWinKey - Desativar tecla Windows durante o jogo
pt-BR.app_clibor: Clibor - Utilitário de gerenciamento de área de transferência
pt-BR.app_obs: OBS Studio - Gerenciamento de transmissão e gravação
pt-BR.app_vtube: VTube Studio - Gerenciamento de avatar virtual
pt-BR.app_discord: Discord - Comunicação e Rich Presence (Em Breve)
pt-BR.global_settings_intro: Configure definições para todo o aplicativo, incluindo idioma, integrações e comportamento do sistema.
pt-BR.setting_language: Idioma: Detecção automática ou seleção manual
pt-BR.troubleshoot_step_1: Verifique a configuração do jogo na aba Configurações de Jogo
pt-BR.troubleshoot_step_2: Verifique o Steam App ID ou caminho do executável
pt-BR.troubleshoot_step_3: Certifique-se de que a plataforma (Steam/Epic/Riot) está em execução
pt-BR.troubleshoot_step_4: Verifique os logs do aplicativo para mensagens de erro
pt-BR.obs_troubleshoot_1: Verifique se o OBS Studio está rodando com o plugin WebSocket
pt-BR.obs_troubleshoot_2: Verifique as configurações de Host e Porta nas Configurações Globais
pt-BR.obs_troubleshoot_3: Certifique-se de que a senha do WebSocket corresponde à configuração
pt-BR.obs_troubleshoot_4: Teste a conexão nas configurações de WebSocket do OBS
pt-BR.anticheat_info: O Focus Game Deck foi projetado para ser compatível com anti-cheat. Se encontrar problemas:
pt-BR.anticheat_tip_1: Certifique-se de estar usando a versão de lançamento assinada digitalmente
pt-BR.anticheat_tip_2: Adicione o Focus Game Deck à lista branca do seu antivírus
pt-BR.anticheat_tip_3: Relate quaisquer falsos positivos à equipe de desenvolvimento

id-ID.description_1: adalah alat otomatisasi lingkungan game terpadu yang gratis dan open-source. Dengan satu file eksekusi, Anda dapat mengonfigurasi game melalui GUI yang intuitif atau meluncurkannya langsung dari baris perintah. Alat ini mencegah konflik anti-cheat, mengonfigurasi pengaturan yang dioptimalkan untuk game (seperti menonaktifkan tombol Windows), dan terintegrasi dengan OBS, Discord (Segera Hadir), dan VTube Studio untuk menciptakan lingkungan game yang sempurna secara otomatis. Dibangun dengan PowerShell dan WPF, alat ini menggunakan file konfigurasi JSON untuk pengaturan dan memberikan pengalaman pengguna yang mulus.
id-ID.description_2: Focus Game Deck dibuat untuk game kompetitif dan streaming game. Selain penggunaan pribadi dan pendidikan, alat ini juga tersedia gratis untuk penggunaan komersial di bawah lisensi MIT.
id-ID.download_description: Focus Game Deck tersedia untuk Windows 10/11 sebagai file eksekusi yang sederhana dan ringan (hanya beberapa MB). Cukup klik dua kali untuk membuka antarmuka konfigurasi yang intuitif. Tentu saja, Anda juga dapat meluncurkan game langsung dari baris perintah jika diinginkan. Rilis terbaru dan kode sumber tersedia melalui GitHub.
id-ID.features_description: Salah satu fitur utama Focus Game Deck adalah dukungannya untuk integrasi platform game yang luas. Perangkat lunak ini mendukung banyak peluncur game dan proses pengoptimalan otomatis yang dapat dijalankan secara bersamaan untuk memberikan solusi manajemen lingkungan game yang komprehensif. Selain itu, alat ini menawarkan berbagai fitur pengoptimalan untuk berbagai skenario game dan tugas yang perlu dilakukan secara berkala.
id-ID.feature_unified: Antarmuka Terpadu - eksekusi tunggal dengan konfigurasi GUI terintegrasi dan peluncuran game langsung
id-ID.feature_process: Manajemen Proses - nonaktifkan sementara proses yang bertentangan selama sesi game
id-ID.feature_anticheat: Kompatibilitas Anti-cheat - mencegah konflik umum dengan sistem anti-cheat seperti BattlEye dan EasyAntiCheat
id-ID.feature_platform: Integrasi Platform - dukungan untuk Steam, Epic Games Store, dan Riot Client
id-ID.feature_obs: Integrasi OBS - peluncuran otomatis, aktivasi buffer putar ulang
id-ID.feature_discord: Integrasi Discord - pembaruan status dan integrasi Rich Presence (Segera Hadir)
id-ID.feature_system: Pengoptimalan Sistem - penonaktifan tombol Windows, pengalihan rencana daya, dan pengoptimalan sumber daya
id-ID.feature_config: Manajemen Konfigurasi - konfigurasi berbasis JSON dengan validasi dan cadangan
id-ID.feature_logging: Pencatatan Log - pencatatan log komprehensif dan pelaporan kesalahan untuk pemecahan masalah
id-ID.feature_restore: Pemulihan Otomatis - memulihkan lingkungan asli setelah sesi game berakhir.
id-ID.footer_copyright: Hak Cipta (c) 2025 Focus Game Deck. Dirilis di bawah Lisensi MIT.
id-ID.hero_image_alt: Tangkapan layar aplikasi Focus Game Deck
id-ID.feedback_description: Laporan bug dan permintaan fitur selalu diterima! Bantu kami meningkatkan Focus Game Deck dengan membagikan pemikiran dan pengalaman Anda.
id-ID.manual_subtitle: Panduan lengkap untuk antarmuka lingkungan game terpadu
id-ID.quick_start_intro: Focus Game Deck v2.0.0 memperkenalkan antarmuka terpadu yang menggabungkan manajemen konfigurasi dan peluncuran game dalam satu aplikasi yang ramah pengguna.
id-ID.gui_mode_desc: Cukup klik dua kali Focus-Game-Deck.exe untuk membuka antarmuka konfigurasi.
id-ID.cli_mode_desc: Jalankan Focus-Game-Deck.exe <game-id> untuk meluncurkan game langsung dari baris perintah.
id-ID.game_launcher_intro: Tab Peluncur Game adalah antarmuka utama Anda untuk meluncurkan game yang dikonfigurasi dengan pengaturan yang dioptimalkan.
id-ID.launcher_step_1: Pilih game Anda dari kartu game yang tersedia
id-ID.launcher_step_2: Tinjau status game dan tombol luncurkan
id-ID.launcher_step_3: Klik 'Luncurkan Game' untuk memulai dengan lingkungan yang dioptimalkan
id-ID.launcher_step_4: Aplikasi akan secara otomatis mengonfigurasi pengaturan game
id-ID.launcher_step_5: Game akan diluncurkan dengan perlindungan anti-cheat dan pengoptimalan
id-ID.launcher_feature_1: Peluncuran game satu klik dengan pengoptimalan lingkungan
id-ID.launcher_feature_2: Indikator status real-time untuk setiap game
id-ID.launcher_feature_3: Integrasi dengan Steam, Epic Games Store, dan Riot Client
id-ID.launcher_feature_4: Pemulihan pengaturan otomatis setelah sesi game
id-ID.game_settings_intro: Konfigurasikan game individual dengan parameter peluncuran tertentu, manajemen proses, dan integrasi platform.
id-ID.add_game_step_3: Masukkan detail game (Nama, Steam App ID, Nama Proses)
id-ID.add_game_step_4: Konfigurasikan pengaturan spesifik platform jika diperlukan
id-ID.add_game_step_5: Simpan konfigurasi agar game tersedia di peluncur
id-ID.setting_game_name: Nama Game: Nama tampilan di peluncur
id-ID.setting_steam_id: Steam App ID: Untuk integrasi Steam
id-ID.setting_platform: Platform: Steam, Epic, Riot, atau Mandiri
id-ID.app_management_intro: Konfigurasikan aplikasi mana yang akan dikelola selama sesi game untuk kinerja optimal dan kompatibilitas anti-cheat.
id-ID.app_nowinkey: NoWinKey - Nonaktifkan tombol Windows selama bermain game
id-ID.app_obs: OBS Studio - Manajemen streaming dan perekaman
id-ID.app_discord: Discord - Komunikasi dan Rich Presence (Segera Hadir)
id-ID.global_settings_intro: Konfigurasikan pengaturan seluruh aplikasi termasuk bahasa, integrasi, dan perilaku sistem.
id-ID.setting_language: Bahasa: Deteksi otomatis atau pemilihan manual
id-ID.troubleshoot_step_1: Verifikasi konfigurasi game di tab Pengaturan Game
id-ID.troubleshoot_step_2: Periksa Steam App ID atau jalur eksekusi
id-ID.troubleshoot_step_4: Periksa log aplikasi untuk pesan kesalahan
id-ID.obs_troubleshoot_1: Verifikasi OBS Studio berjalan dengan plugin WebSocket
id-ID.obs_troubleshoot_2: Periksa pengaturan Host dan Port di Pengaturan Global
id-ID.obs_troubleshoot_3: Pastikan kata sandi WebSocket cocok dengan konfigurasi
id-ID.obs_troubleshoot_4: Uji koneksi dari pengaturan WebSocket OBS
id-ID.anticheat_info: Focus Game Deck dirancang agar ramah anti-cheat. Jika Anda mengalami masalah:
id-ID.anticheat_tip_1: Pastikan Anda menggunakan versi rilis yang ditandatangani secara digital
id-ID.anticheat_tip_2: Tambahkan Focus Game Deck ke daftar putih antivirus Anda
id-ID.anticheat_tip_3: Laporkan positif palsu apa pun ke tim pengembangan
